/* Employee.GetEmployee */
SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID, E.DEPARTMENT_ID, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, E.GENDER_CODE, E.BIRTH_YMD, E.PHONE_NUMBER FROM HM_EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN CO_USER U ON U.USER_ID = E.USER_ID AND U.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1
AND U.USER_ID = @UserId
AND E.EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId

/* Employee.UpdateEmployee */
UPDATE HM_EMPLOYEE SET EMPLOYEE_NAME = @EmployeeName, GENDER_CODE = @GenderCode, BIRTH_YMD = @BirthYmd, PHONE_NUMBER = @PhoneNumber, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId
